CustomField.description: Determines whether the file is available for preview
CustomField.formula: OR( Type__c = "application/msword", Type__c = "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document", Type__c = "application/pdf", Type__c = "image/png", Type__c = "image/jpeg", Type__c = "image/webp", Type__c = "image/tiff" )
CustomField.label: Is Previewable File?
